content: durin42 has marked this topic as resolved.
By the way, where is the configuration for the buildkite job stored? Mainly wondering what it enables in terms of assertions, sanitizers and profilers.

Right now it's just a bash script. The output is https://buildkite.com/llvm-project/rust-llvm-integrate-prototype, and I'm happy to paste whatever stuff you're interested in, and add components that we should execute the tests for. I tried to cherry-pick only the test categories that seemed to make sense for LLVM changes.
(BTW it's green for the first time!)

It's a little kludgey (we're applying that one phab diff from LLVM that fixes the LTO issue, and cherry-picking the allocators patch), but it's at least a baseline we can keep from backsliding, and hopefully soon I can get some traction on an allocator-in-IR annotation.
